name: factfull
0:
”Alexa, open fact full”
”Alexa, launch fact full”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fact full
des: Each game consists of 5 trivia questions and if you do not know the answer you can skip as many questions as you wish. After each correct answer you earn a score point and there is not a penalty for incorrect answers. This trivia is prepared using the open and reliable data sources such as U.N., World Bank and WHO. If you would like to learn more facts then please visit www.gapminder.org.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
